name: D/D Evil
text: Cannot attack unless you control another "D/D" monster. During your opponent's Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Pendulum Summoned monster your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of this turn. You can only use this effect of "D/D Evil" once per turn.
pendulum_text: Once, while this card is in your Pendulum Zone, when your opponent Pendulum Summons a monster(s): You can activate this effect; this turn, that Pendulum Summoned monster(s) cannot attack, also negate its effects (even if this card leaves the field).
